Good To Know

Sharing

Feel free to repost your commission art with credit (check that list of social links to your left). Tag me if you're sharing on a platform I've got, otherwise please link to one.

Your final result will be posted of course, go ahead and reblog/retweet it! It's all yours.


Timing

Every piece is different, but I'll always update you regularly with a progress sketch. If your piece is a character design or you don't have references, I'll send you a few options as I go.

Go ahead and message me anywhere with questions, extra refs, or a progress update request!


What to Ask For?

Special Requests
